title: Public Service Internship
description: Individual placements for field learning performed in nonprofit organizations or government agencies dedicated to providing services in the areas of education, government, social issues, and health. May be taken for credit up to three times for a maximum of twelve units. Contract completed prior to start of internship will include intellectually unified expectations and means of supervision. Faculty member and student will meet regularly. Prerequisites: ninety units completed; 2.5 minimum cumulative GPA; department approval.
